item.description:
My improv troupe, Active Ingredients, performs in this year’s Boston Improv Festival, which covers three stages and features over 100 improv, sketch, and stand-up acts from all over – including Los Angeles, Chicago, Toronto, New York, Providence - and more!

Come check out our original improv format called the BackForward, which will move backwards and forwards in time with very funny consequences.

Check out the Festival website at http://www.bostonimprovfest.com/index.php where you can peruse the troupes and schedule. Discount ticket packages are available for seeing multiple shows.

Tickets to our show also include two hysterical improv troupes - My Two Moms and OBV. Buy tickets to the show at https://www.vendini.com/ti cket-software.html?e=3f0f8 e6f9100aba4782d27e278eaf053&t=tix
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside lobby; I will come out after my show and meet everyone.
item.name: Active Ingredients performs at Boston Improv Festival
